title.description: The display name of the template

configurationName.description: The name of the configuration that will be generated with this template

name.description: The name of the DSC module as it appears on the PowerShell gallery

version.description: The version number of the module that is used for this template

powershellName.description: The name of this property to be used in PowerShell scripts

displayName.description: The name of the property as shown in the DSC Studio UI

valueType.description: The type of this property to ask the user for

minOccurences.description: For boolean properties - the minimum number of nodes that must have this set to 'true' for a configuration to be valid

maxOccurences.description: For boolean properties - the maximum number of nodes that can have this set to 'true' for a configuration to be valid

certificateDetails.description: Ask for a certificate thumbprint and path to CER file to allow for encryption of credentials, setting to false will configure DSC to allow plain text passwords (NOT RECOMMENDED)

allowPlainTextPassword.description: Not recommended - Should this template allow users to use plain text passwords in the output? Default is false

minNodeCount.description: The minimum number of nodes to be added to this configuration (defaults to 1 if not specified)

maxNodeCount.description: The maximum numbder of nodes that can be added to this configuration (no limit if not specified)

id.description: An internal ID for this question to use when refering to it in resource values

title.description: The name of the question to show to the user

type.description: The type of question to show to the user

defaultValue.description: What should the default value of this question be?

group.description: A group heading to put this question in to

helpText.description: Additional help text that can be shown for a specific question.

validationMessage.description: The validation error message to be shown to the user

minValue.description: The minimum value of this field (for number fields only)

maxValue.description: The minimum value of this field (for number fields only)

pattern.description: The regular expression to validate this field with (for regex fields only)

choices.description: A list of choices to present the user for this question type

showForTrueResponseQuestion.description: The ID of a boolean question that controls whether or not this question should be displayed and validated

name.description: The name of the parameter to add to the configuration

parameterType.description: The object type in PowerShell for this parameter

resourceType.description: The name of the DSC resource to include

resourceName.description: The friendly name to put on to this resource

resourceProperties.description: A list of the properties and values to include on this resource

dependsOn.description: The DependsOn value for this resource

includeQuestion.description: The ID of a boolean question that determines if this resource should be included or not

includeNodeDataProperty.description: The powershell name of a node data question that determines if this resource should be included or not

includeScriptTest.description: A PowerShell statement that should evaluate to $true or $false to determine if this resource applies to the current node
